page.title: 07ECOLOGY
page.content: Interview with resident (cont'd): Here, the E.E.C.'s cumbersome bureaucracy has caused such delay that local support is evaporating in disillusionment as people lose faith. He would welcome widespread tree- planting in place of arterial roads linking Devon with the rest of Britain; but the new link-road will cause severe congestion around Fairy Cross, bringing ever more outsiders to transplant their own suburban mini- environments into this attractive area, to conduct industrial management increasingly by computer-link. Other detrimental changes include farmer's wanton destruction of hedgerows, causing dramatic losses in variety and quantity of flora and fauna. He is thrilled to live here,however, despite the hazardous waters of Bideford Bay, till he moves permanently to Cornwall.
